verses.verse: <S%H1984>Praise<s%> the <S%H3050>Lord!<s%> <S%H7891>Sing<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song,<s%> And His <S%H8416>praise<s%> in the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H2623>ones.<s%>
Let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in his <S%H6213>Maker;<s%> Let the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in their <S%H4428>King.<s%>
Let them <S%H1984>praise<s%> His <S%H8034>name<s%> with <S%H4234>dancing;<s%> Let them <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises<s%> to Him with <S%H8596>timbrel<s%> and <S%H3658>lyre.<s%>
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7521>takes<s%> <S%H7521>pleasure<s%> in His <S%H5971>people;<s%> He will <S%H6286>beautify<s%> the <S%H6035>afflicted<s%> <S%H6035>ones<s%> with <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>
Let the <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H2623>ones<s%> <S%H5937>exult<s%> in <S%H9202>glory;<s%> Let them <S%H7442>sing<s%> for <S%H7442>joy<s%> on their <S%H4904>beds.<s%>
[Let] the <S%H7318>high<s%> <S%H7318>praises<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> [be] in their <S%H1627>mouth,<s%> And a two-edged <S%H2719>sword<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand,<s%>
To <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> on the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> And <S%H8433>punishment<s%> on the <S%H3816>peoples;<s%>
To <S%H631>bind<s%> their <S%H4428>kings<s%> with <S%H9108>chains,<s%> And their <S%H3513>nobles<s%> with <S%H3525>fetters<s%> of <S%H1270>iron;<s%>

To <S%H6213>execute<s%> on them the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H3789>written;<s%> <S%H1931>This<s%> is an <S%H1926>honor<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H2623>ones.<s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> the <S%H3050>Lord!<s%>
